title: Rumors
itunes:title: Rumors
description:
The crew discusses how Lil 1/2 dead wound up being accused as Pac's shooter, Reggie addresses how the BS in the rumor mill has impacted him, Kevin Gaines and the fellas have a heated discussion on changing the perception of gangs. Press play and enjoy. Make sure you hit our Facebook page up and like https://www.facebook.com/TheGangsterChronicles If we can get the page up to 10,000 likes we will drop a new video show on Facebook. Lets get it popping. Thanks for your support! Support the show. See omnystudio.com/policies/listener for privacy information.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
